thread.title: Raffaele Ardito
thread.title_full: Atheneum Partners bewertet von Raffaele Ardito

author: Raffaele Ardito
title: Raffaele Ardito
text: Some week ago I took part in an oncological drug study with Atheneum Partners. The experience was really interesting and the interaction with all Atheneum Partners member was very effective. I gave them my availability for future collaboration.
